about.title: About
about.description: ISMIN engineering student (Mines Saint-Étienne) in microelectronics and computer science. From embedded systems to web/mobile development, I adapt quickly to technologies to meet business needs.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.project1Description: Personal website built with Next.js 15, i18n and dark mode. Clean design focused on content with Framer Motion animations.
projects.project2Description: Project description with scale animation on hover
projects.project3Description: Project description with scale animation on hover

personal-website.title: nkardas.fr
personal-website.description: Personal portfolio with Next.js 15, React 19 and Tailwind CSS v4. Minimalist design with dark mode and internationalization.

ascon-aead128.title: ASCON-AEAD128
ascon-aead128.description: SystemVerilog modeling of an Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) algorithm. Secure hardware architecture for FPGA.

ecg-ihm.title: ECG HMI
ecg-ihm.description: Integrated portable ECG device: flexible cleanroom-fabricated electrodes, STM32 acquisition card and LED display. Complete multidisciplinary biomedical project.

serre-iot.title: IoT Connected Greenhouse
serre-iot.description: Smart greenhouse with environmental sensors, LoRaWAN transmission and cloud automation (Datacake). Resource optimization for sustainable agriculture.

guitare-prototypage.title: Training Guitar
guitare-prototypage.description: Guitar prototype with capacitive sensors and LED matrix to help beginners. Real-time detection of pressure on strings and frets.

securite-web.title: Web Security
securite-web.description: Pentesting on DVWA and PyFlaSQL development. Exploitation of vulnerabilities (SQL Injection, XSS, File Inclusion) and application security learning.

1nsyt.title: 1NSYT - AI Chrome Extension
1nsyt.description: Chrome extension with generative AI (Mistral AI) for LinkedIn. Fullstack architecture (Next.js 15, Prisma, Redis), complete GDPR compliance and admin dashboard.

lab-o-matic.title: Lab-O-Matic - LIMS
lab-o-matic.description: Professional fullstack LIMS for industrial laboratory. Modern architecture (NestJS + Next.js 15) with ERP and Firebase integrations. Freelance project in production.
